name: Life is Short - Game 7
description:
Life is Short

A  game about surviving and life. You play as the leader of a hunter gatherer tribe trying to survive in the harsh plains of Africa.

How long can your tribe survive?

How to Play

You control your character by clicking on different things to interact with them. For example, you can click on the ground to move or craft something (as long as you have the required resources) and click on other tribe members to get them tasks to do.

Each tribe member needs food to survive. If there is food available they will eat it, but if not someone must harvest and gather it.

If you have at least one man and woman in the tribe, there is a chance a baby will arrive. Babies need constant looking after and need to be kept fed. But if they survive they will grow into a child and become the next generation and ensure the tribe keeps surviving.

When your character dies, the next oldest member of the tribe will become leader and you will control them instead.

If all your tribe die, it is game over.

Mute Sound - M
